news_header: Bankruptcy applications were highest in services, construction, and trade, with 381 proceedings initiated in January 2025, an increase of 83 from the previous year.
news_original_title: Konkurssien määrä nousi 2000-luvun ennätykseen – edellisen kerran kuukausitasolla niitä oli näin paljon syksyllä 1997
news_text: This marks the highest monthly bankruptcy rate since October 1997 and is 10% higher than previous record months in the 2000s. The number of enterprises filing for bankruptcy more than doubled compared to the previous year, with one-person enterprises making up two-thirds of the filings. Overall, bankruptcies have increased by 8% over the past year.
